biography.title: Biography
biography.intro: Passionate about visual arts for over 10 years, I transform every moment into a work of art.
biography.body: My approach combines professional technique and artistic sensitivity to capture the essence of each project. From portrait photography to music videos, each creation tells a unique story.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: Discover my selection of artistic and commercial photography.

clips.title: Professional Video Clips
clips.description: Creative video productions for artists, brands and events.

event.title: Event Coverage
event.description: Photo and video reports for your professional and private events.

contact.title: Let's discuss your project
contact.subtitle: Whether you need a photo session, video clip, or event coverage, I'm here to bring your ideas to life.
contact.name: Full name
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your vision, goals, and expectations...
contact.successDetails: I'll get back to you within 24 hours. Check your emails (including spam folder).
contact.faqA1: Usually 7-14 days for photos, 2-4 weeks for video depending on complexity.
contact.faqA2: Yes, I travel throughout Ivory Coast and internationally upon request.
contact.faqA3: Absolutely! All my quotes are free with no obligation.
contact.urgentText: Need a quick response? Contact me directly on WhatsApp.

errors.nameShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.messageShort: Message must be at least 10 characters
